description: Comfortable, warm vest in a lovely, thick pile fleece. Made from recycled polyester with a structured outside and a jersey backing. Zippered hand pockets and buttoned chest pocket in G-1000 Eco in a contrasting colour. Roomy fit that allows for insulating layers underneath. Great on top of a shirt or sweater to keep your core toasty warm.
name: Fjallraven Vardag Pile Fleece Vest - Mens
